00017 bool SACMethodALMeDS::computeModel(){
00018 
00019 
00020 
00021         // Warn and exit if no threshold was set
00022         if (this->threshold == -1)
00023         {
00024                 cout<<"[ALMeDS::computeModel] No threshold set!"<<endl;
00025                 return (false);
00026         }
00027 
00028         this->iterations = 0;
00029         double bestPenaltyFound = DBL_MAX;
00030 
00031         std::vector<int> bestModelInliers;
00032         Eigen::VectorXd estimatedModelCoefficients;
00033         std::vector<double> distances;
00034 
00035         int noInliersCurrentModel = 0;
00036 
00037         // Iterate
00038         while (this->iterations < this->maxIterations)
00039         {
00040 
00041                 //Compute a random model from the input pointcloud
00042                bool isDegenerate = false;
00043                bool modelFound = false;
00044 
00045                this->objectModel->computeRandomModel(this->iterations,estimatedModelCoefficients,isDegenerate,modelFound);
00046 
00047                if (!isDegenerate) break;
00048 
00049                if(!modelFound){
00050                    this->iterations++;
00051                    continue;
00052                }
00053 
00054 
00055                 double crrentModelPenalty = 0;
00056                 std::vector<int> inliers;
00057 
00058                 //Find the points inside threshold distance to the model
00059                 this->objectModel->selectWithinDistance (estimatedModelCoefficients, this->threshold, inliers);
00060 
00061                 distances.resize (inliers.size ());
00062                 // Iterate through the inliers and calculate the distances from them to the model
00063                 this->objectModel->getInlierDistance (inliers, estimatedModelCoefficients, distances);
00064                 std::sort (distances.begin (), distances.end ());
00065                 int mid = inliers.size () / 2;
00066 
00067                 if (inliers.size () % 2 == 0)
00068                         // d_cur_penalty = median (distances)
00069                         crrentModelPenalty = (sqrt (distances[mid-1]) + sqrt (distances[mid])) / 2;
00070                 else
00071                         crrentModelPenalty = sqrt (distances[mid]);
00072 
00073                 if (crrentModelPenalty < bestPenaltyFound)
00074                 {
00075                         bestPenaltyFound = crrentModelPenalty;
00076 
00077                         // Save the current model/coefficients selection as being the best so far
00078                         this->modelCoefficients = estimatedModelCoefficients;
00079                 }
00080 
00081                 this->iterations++;
00082 
00083         }
00084 
00085 
00086         // Iterate through the 3d points and calculate the distances from them to the model again
00087         this->objectModel->getDistancesToModel (this->modelCoefficients, distances);
00088 
00089         this->inliers.resize (distances.size ());
00090         // Get the inliers for the best model found
00091         noInliersCurrentModel = 0;
00092         for (size_t i = 0; i < distances.size (); ++i)
00093                 if (distances[i] <= this->threshold)
00094                         this->inliers[noInliersCurrentModel++] = i;
00095 
00096         // Resize the inliers vector
00097         this->inliers.resize (noInliersCurrentModel);
00098 
00099         if (this->inliers.size () == 0)
00100                         {
00101                                 cout<<"[ALMeDS::computeModel] Unable to find a solution!"<<endl;
00102                                 return (false);
00103                         }
00104         return (true);
00105 }
00106 
00107 }
